function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of infectious diseases due to limited transportation networks and early shutdowns","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions, mass testing, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine development and distribution technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government organizations, international health agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in cybercrime and spread of disinformation/misinformation","Impact":"Threat to cybersecurity, public health, and safety","Mitigation":"Enhance cybersecurity measures, promote digital literacy, and fact-checking initiatives","Technologies":"Cybersecurity software, artificial intelligence for content moderation, secure communication systems","People":"General public, online users, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Technology companies, social media platforms, government agencies"},{"Description":"Disruption of food chains and scarcity of resources due to climate change impacts","Impact":"Decreased food production, loss of biodiversity, and extreme weather conditions","Mitigation":"Adopt sustainable agricultural practices, conservation efforts, and climate-resilient infrastructure","Technologies":"Precision agriculture technologies, conservation drones, climate monitoring systems","People":"Farmers, local communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Agricultural organizations, conservation groups, government agencies"}]}
